name: Kochira Katsushika-ku Kameari Kouen Mae Hashutsujo: High-Tech Buil Shinkou Soshi Sakusen! no Maki
overview: Kochira Katsushikaku Kameari Kouenzen: Hashutsujo - High-Tech Building Shinkou Soshi Sakusen! no Kan is a Strategy game, developed by Aisystem Tokyo and published by Bandai, which was released in Japan in 1997.
